item.title: Spanish village where people go wild for tossing their ham
Thereâ€™s a band in Manchester where the drummer is literally some mushrooms
item.description: Bionic and the Wires, created by Jon Ross and Andy Kidd in 2023, are producing tunes in a way you have never seen before.

item.title: Bodies of two Israeli hostages recovered from Gaza by military as attacks intensify
item.description: The remains of Ilan Weiss and another unnamed captive were found just as Israel launched an offensive on the region.

item.title: Nuclear power plant forced to shut down after jellyfish infestation
item.description: A 'massive and unpredictable' swarm of jellyfish entered the plant's pumping stations.

item.title: Feline felon has paw printed and mugshots taken after scratching police officers
item.description: The feline felon was let off with a warning not to bite anyone in the future.
